doc.field: Morris Paris was a radio news commentator for WEVD, and assistant deputy controller of New York, N.Y. from 1938 to 1963. The papers contain typewritten manuscripts of "Review of the Week" (1943-1946), news commentary on WEVD, the Jewish Daily Forward Radio Station. Papers also include a series of articles titled, "Limited Dividend Housing becomes a Racket" (1934).

Morris Paris was a radio news commentator for WEVD, and assistant deputy controller of New York, N.Y. from 1938 to 1963. The papers contain typewritten manuscripts of "Review of the Week" (1943-1946), news commentary on WEVD, the Jewish Daily Forward Radio Station. Papers also include a series of articles titled, "Limited Dividend Housing becomes a Racket" (1934).

The papers contain typewritten manuscripts of "Review of the Week" (1943-1946), news commentary on WEVD, the Jewish Daily Forward Radio Station. Papers also include a series of articles titled, "Limited Dividend Housing becomes a Racket" (1934).
Morris Paris was a radio news commentator for WEVD, and assistant deputy controller of New York, N.Y. from 1938 to 1963.
Donated by Selma Paris, 1971. The accession number associated with this gift is 1971.002
